title: Infosys Extends Strategic Collaboration With DNB Bank ASA To Accelerate Its Digital Transformation 1d - Infosys extends collaboration with DNB Bank to accelerate digital transformation using Finacle and AI technologies.
date: 1d - Infosys extends collaboration with DNB Bank to accelerate digital transformation using Finacle and AI technologies.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR Regulations 2d - Infosys completes stake sale in Japan JV HIPUS to Mitsubishi Heavy Industries on May 14, 2025.
date: 2d - Infosys completes stake sale in Japan JV HIPUS to Mitsubishi Heavy Industries on May 14, 2025.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR Regulations 13 May - Infosys fined CAD 21,416.76 by Canada Revenue Agency for alleged tax short payment, no material impact.
date: 13 May - Infosys fined CAD 21,416.76 by Canada Revenue Agency for alleged tax short payment, no material impact.

title: Infosys And LTA Sign Strategic Technology Partnership For The Historic Tournament At Queens Club, London 13 May - Infosys partners with LTA for 3-year AI tech support at historic Queen's Club tennis tournament.
date: 13 May - Infosys partners with LTA for 3-year AI tech support at historic Queen's Club tennis tournament.
